ZCB.ZCBackstoryDef.title: food thief
ZCB.ZCBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] loved to eat, often getting into trouble for stealing more of [PAWN_possessive] share of the tribe's food. As punishment [PAWN_pronoun] was put to work in the kitchens, where [PAWN_pronoun] learned to love the art of cooking.

ZCB.ZCBackstoryDef.title: ascetic child
ZCB.ZCBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was never interested in furniture with ostantatious filigree or fancy, gluttonous meals. However, [PAWN_pronoun] could still appreciate good craftsmanship when it counted.

ZCB.ZCBackstoryDef.title: brawler
ZCB.ZCBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was good in a fight, always training to be stronger. [PAWN_pronoun] learned to shrug off hits that would have a lesser fighter on the ground.\n\Adds trait: Tough

ZCB.ZCBackstoryDef.title: scavenger
ZCB.ZCBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] spent [PAWN_possessive] childhood learning as much as [PAWN_pronoun] could about everything, making [PAWN_objective] a bit eccentric to the rest of [PAWN_possessive] tribe. [PAWN_pronoun] was especially interested in disassembling old mechs to see how they are made, with the hope of advancing technology for [PAWN_possessive] tribe.

ZCB.ZCBackstoryDef.title: tortured architect
ZCB.ZCBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was tortured by visions of architectural grandeur that his tribe could never live up to.

ZCB.ZCBackstoryDef.title: barbarian
ZCB.ZCBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] enjoyed hurting people, often getting into fights. [PAWN_pronoun] loved utterly crushing [PAWN_possessive] unfortunate targets.
